title: Bug 116564: The title of hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options", now it changes with settings.
OB: When clicking on "OK" and reopening the hyperlink builder, its title becomes "www.actuate.com".
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options", but it changes with settings.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Click on "OK" in the hyperlink builder.
2. Reopen the hyperlink builder.
